Author: Liza Carvelli, WigglyMuffin
Name: Questionable
Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream

Author: Liza Carvelli, WigglyMuffin
Name: Influx
Punchline: Sync game stats to InfluxDB or QuestDB
Description: Uploads your game statistics (such as quest progress, gil, retainer stats) to an InfluxDB or QuestDB instance, making it possible to automatically track your progress through external tools such as Grafana.

Author: WigglyMuffin
Name: Mercury's Eye
Punchline: Search across worlds and data centers
Description: A search plugin that allows searching through all world and data centers.
